"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a4e20e2f-9c29-11d8-aef7-889628b8efa3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Gazdagok lakomája</string>
            <string language="en">Feast of the Rich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fest der Rich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Régal des riches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Festa dos rich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Festività dei rich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιορτή των πλουσίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Banquete de los ricos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A 18. században kevesebb volt az éhínség, de a megnövekedő népesség miatt kevesebb volt az átlagosan egy főre jutó élelem is.</string>
            <string language="en">In the 18. century the starving was very big, the food per capita was on a par less, because of  the growing population.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">élelmezés,  demográfia,  népesedés,  életmód,  </string>
            <string language="en">feeding, demography, growth of the the population, lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im Jahrhundert 18., welches das Verhungern, die 
Nahrung per capita sehr groß war, auf einer Gleichheit weniger, wegen
der war das Wachsen Bevölkerung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En siècle 18. que mourir de faim était très 
grand, la nourriture était par habitant sur un pair moins, en raison 
de la population croissant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No século onde 18. starving era muito grande, o 
alimento por o capita estava em um par mais menos, por causa da 
população de crescimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel secolo che 18. starving era molto grande, 
l'alimento per capita era su un par più di meno, a causa della 
popolazione crescente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στον αιώνα 18, να λιμοκτονήσει ήταν πολύ μεγάλο, 
τα τρόφιμα κατά κεφαλήν ήταν σε μια ισοτιμία λιγότερο, λόγω του
αυξανόμενου πληθυσμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el siglo 18. que el morir de hambre era muy 
grande, el alimento por capita estaba en una igualdad menos, 
debido a la población en crecimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einziehen, Demographie, Wachstum der Bevölkerung, Lebensstil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alimentation, démographie, croissance la de la population, 
style de vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alimentação, demografia, crescimento o da população, 
lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alimentazione, demografia, sviluppo della popolazione, 
lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σίτιση, δημογραφία, αύξηση του πληθυσμού, τρόπος ζωής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alimentación, demografía, crecimiento el población, forma de 
vida</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
